pages.text: Wo que yi faxian yige fu ren, tongzhi yizu ren, ta huode wanwu de xiangshou, ta you yige pangda de baozuo
Wo faxian ta he ta de chenmin dou she an la er chongbai taiyang, emo ceng yi tamen de xingwei mihuo tamen, yizhi zu'ai tamen zou shang zhengdao, suoyi tamen bu zunxun zhengdao
Tamen bu wei an la er koutou——jieshi tiandi aomi, erqie shen zhi nimen suo yinhui he biaobai de zhu
An la, chu ta wai, jue wu ying shou chongbai zhe, ta shi weida de baozuo de zhu.”
Ta shuo:“Wo yao kan kan ni jiujing shi chengshi de, haishi shuohuang de
Ni ba wo zhe feng xin dai qu tou gei tamen, ranhou, likai tamen, ni shikan tamen ruhe dafu.”
Ta shuo:“Chen pumen a! Wo jie dao yi feng guizhong de xin
Zhe feng xin que shi su lai man ji lai de, zhe feng de neirong shi:‘Feng zhiren zhi ci de an la zhi ming
Nimen buyao dui wo aoman wu li, nimen yingdang lai guishun wo.’”
Ta shuo:“Chen pumen a! Guanyu wo de shi, wang nimen chu ge yijian. Wo conglai bu jueding renhe yi jian shi, zhidao nimen zai wo mianqian.”
Tamen shuo:“Women ji you wuli, you you yongqi. Women dui ni wei ming shi cong, qing ni xiang yi xiang, ni yao women zuo shenme.”
Ta shuo:“Guowangmen mei gong ru yige chengshi, bi pohuai qizhong de jianshe, bi shi qizhong de guizu bian cheng jianmin, tamen zhexie ren, ye hui zheyang zuo de
Wo biding yao pai ren song liwu qu gei tamen, ranhou, dengdaizhuo kan shi chen dai hui shenme xiaoxi lai.”
